| BR-001 | A Workflow dropdown option titled “Silverchair - Journals” is available in the “OUP - Atlas Deliver” screen. | Given that I have navigated to any journal Issue or Article package in Atlas, and launched the “OUP - Atlas Deliver” screen (by clicking “Deliver”) When I view the Workflow dropdown options Then I see an option for “Silverchair - Journals” | CC: 1, Decision Points: 0, Activities: 1, Paths: 1 |
| BR-002 | The pre-defined pipeline for all journals content would be JATS2SCJATS. | Given that I have selected the “Silverchair - Journals” workflow option When I view my form fill options Then they match the options outlined in the scope above | CC: 1, Decision Points: 0, Activities: 1, Paths: 1 |
| BR-003 | If the workflow is selected, the following form fill options are available for the user to input: Submission type. | Given I have left one or more mandatory field blank When I select submit Then I see an error message pop up in the UI telling me which fields I need to populate | CC: 2, Decision Points: 1, Activities: 1, Paths: 2 |
| BR-004 | The Submission type dropdown list includes options: Preview and Publish. | Given I have successfully completed all mandatory fields When I select submit Then my workflow is triggered And then when I go to the Atlas Workflows → Records List APS 24 screen, I see a row for each package included in my delivery with an initial status of “IN PROGRESS” | CC: 3, Decision Points: 2, Activities: 2, Paths: 3 |
| BR-005 | The Silverchair endpoint dropdown list includes options: Silverchair Staging and Silverchair Live. | Given that my delivery has failed When I go to the Atlas Workflows → Records List APS 24 screen Then I see the status “FAILED” against my package, with a failure reason | CC: 2, Decision Points: 1, Activities: 1, Paths: 2 |
| BR-006 | The option for Silverchair Live should only be available on Prod. | Given that my delivery has succeeded When I go to the Atlas Workflows → Records List APS 24 screen Then I see the status “SUCCESS” against my package | CC: 2, Decision Points: 1, Activities: 1, Paths: 2 |
| BR-007 | The Include content from all folders EXCEPT dropdown list overrides any file inclusions below. | Given that my delivery was successful When I go to zipline Then I see my content delivered to expected endpoint, in expected state | CC: 2, Decision Points: 1, Activities: 1, Paths: 2 |
| BR-008 | If the Include content from all folders EXCEPT dropdown is left blank, then ALL content is included as default. | Given that I have left one or more mandatory field blank When I select submit Then I see an error message pop up in the UI telling me which fields I need to populate | CC: 2, Decision Points: 1, Activities: 1, Paths: 2 |
| BR-009 | The Include all file types EXCEPT dropdown list should be generic across all forms. | Given I have successfully completed all mandatory fields When I select submit Then my workflow is triggered And then when I go to the Atlas Workflows → Records List APS 24 screen, I see a row for each package included in my delivery with an initial status of “IN PROGRESS” | CC: 3, Decision Points: 2, Activities: 2, Paths: 3 |
| BR-010 | If the Include all file types EXCEPT dropdown is left blank, then ALL content is included as default. | Given that my delivery has failed When I go to the Atlas Workflows → Records List APS 24 screen Then I see the status “FAILED” against my package, with a failure reason | CC: 2, Decision Points: 1, Activities: 1, Paths: 2 |
| BR-011 | The “Submit” button must be present on the form. | Given that my delivery has succeeded When I go to the Atlas Workflows → Records List APS 24 screen Then I see the status “SUCCESS” against my package | CC: 3, Decision Points: 2, Activities: 3, Paths: 3 |
| BR-012 | Folder exclusion logic trumps file exclusion. | Given that my delivery was successful When I go to zipline Then I see my content delivered to expected endpoint, in expected state | CC: 2, Decision Points: 1, Activities: 1, Paths: 2 |
| BR-013 | If a folder is excluded, any content of that file type in an excluded folder will not be sent. | Given that I have left one or more mandatory field blank When I select submit Then I see an error message pop up in the UI telling me which fields I need to populate | CC: 2, Decision Points: 1, Activities: 1, Paths: 2 |
| BR-014 | Once the workflow has been submitted, it should appear as a row on the workflow records screen. | Given I have successfully completed all mandatory fields When I select submit Then my workflow is triggered And then when I go to the Atlas Workflows → Records List APS 24 screen, I see a row for each package included in my delivery with an initial status of “IN PROGRESS” | CC: 3, Decision Points: 2, Activities: 2, Paths: 3 |
| BR-015 | Failed content should include a failure message. | Given that my delivery has failed When I go to the Atlas Workflows → Records List APS 24 screen Then I see the status “FAILED” against my package, with a failure reason | CC: 2, Decision Points: 1, Activities: 1, Paths: 2 |
| BR-016 | Successful content should deliver to Zipline in expected state. | Given that my delivery has succeeded When I go to the Atlas Workflows → Records List APS 24 screen Then I see the status “SUCCESS” against my package | CC: 2, Decision Points: 1, Activities: 1, Paths: 2 |
| BR-017 | Where Submission type is “preview” (and content has not previously been published) then content appears in zipline in an UNPUBLISHED state. | Given that I have successfully completed all mandatory fields When I select submit Then my workflow is triggered And then when I go to zipline Then I see my content delivered to expected endpoint, in expected state | CC: 3, Decision Points: 2, Activities: 2, Paths: 3 |
